description: Decimal expansion of square root of 68.
comments: Continued fraction expansion is 8 followed by {4, 16} repeated. - _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 08 2009
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
prog: (PARI) { default(realprecision, 20080); x=sqrt(68); for (n=1, 20000, d=floor(x); x=(x-d)*10; write("b010520.txt", n, " ", d)); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 08 2009
crossrefs: Cf. A040059 Continued fraction. - _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 08 2009
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
